-  updateEquipment(_:faceUp:seatControl:pose:boundingBox:context:) 

Type Method# updateEquipment(_:faceUp:seatControl:pose:boundingBox:context:)

visionOS 2.0+

```
static func updateEquipment<E>(
    _ equipment: E,
    faceUp: Bool? = nil,
    seatControl: ControllingSeats? = nil,
    pose: TableVisualState.Pose2D? = nil,
    boundingBox: Rect3D? = nil,
    context: UInt64 = 0
) -> Self where E : Equipment, E.State == CardState
```

Available when `Self` is `UpdateEquipmentAction<CardState>`.## [See Also](/documentation/tabletopkit/tabletopaction/updateequipment(_:faceup:seatcontrol:pose:boundingbox:context:)#see-also)
